nodes.text: Mariusz Gandzel is a freelance artist for Fantasy Flight Games, and produced illustrations for the company's Star Wars-themed games.

Mariusz Gandzel was born in 1980 in the south of Poland. Graduating from the Gliwice Architecture Department, he began drawing science-fiction, fantasy and horror illustrations for books, magazines, board games, role playing games and CD covers. While he is interested in using such physical mediums as water color, oil, and ink, he mainly uses computer-aided graphic design for most of his artwork.
